## Type of change
- [ ] New skill
- [ ] Skill update
- [ ] Shared standard update
- [ ] Governance update
- [ ] Documentation
- [ ] Bug fix
- [ ] Other

## Checklist

### For new skills
- [ ] Skill folder created with all required files (SKILL.md, TEMPLATES.md, RUBRIC.md, EXAMPLES.md)
- [ ] Skill name follows naming conventions in `governance/naming.md`
- [ ] Entry added to `governance/skill-catalog.md`
- [ ] Eval file created in `/evals` (optional for initial release)

### For skill updates
- [ ] Changes don't violate `governance/system-rules.md`
- [ ] RUBRIC.md updated if quality criteria changed
- [ ] EXAMPLES.md updated if workflow changed

### For shared standard updates
- [ ] Change doesn't break existing skills
- [ ] Rationale provided below

### All PRs
- [ ] Content follows standards in `/shared`
- [ ] No spelling or grammar errors
- [ ] Tested with at least one example scenario
